definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: This article deals with the content and form of merchant poems evolution rules.

sentences.english: The ignorant princess has little empathy with the businessmen.
sentences.chinese: 無知的公主跟商賈們沒甚麼同感。

sentences.english: Retired cloth-merchants and rusticating attorneys had not discovered it as yet;
sentences.chinese: 倦遊的商賈和愛好山林的雅士們還沒有發現它。

sentences.english: One businessmen were talking about advertising on TV excitedly.
sentences.chinese: 一些商賈正在興奮地品題辯論電視機廣告。

sentences.english: And a merchant said, "Speak to us of Buying and Selling."
sentences.chinese: 一位商賈說，請給我們談談買賣。

sentences.english: The city is fully open and merchants gathering.
Then added, Hanshin can not "rule of Health merchants."
sentences.chinese: 然後又說，韓信不能“治生商賈”。

definition: to gather (in a crowd)/to converge/to swarm
